# AVMusicTimeStamp

**Type Alias**

A fractional number of beats.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias AVMusicTimeStamp = Double
```

## Discussion

Use this value for all sequencer timeline-related methods. The tempo of the sequence determines the relationship between this value and time (in seconds).

## Managing Time Stamps

- **hostTime(forBeats:error:)**: Gets the host time the sequence plays at the specified position.
- **seconds(forBeats:)**: Gets the time for the specified beat position (timestamp) in the track, in seconds.

items.description: Gets the host time the sequence plays at the specified position.
items.name: hostTime(forBeats:error:)

items.description: Gets the time for the specified beat position (timestamp) in the track, in seconds.
